failed_checks.rule_description: Missing description for security group.
failed_checks.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons
failed_checks.resolution: Add descriptions for all security groups
failed_checks.description: Security group explicitly uses the default description.

failed_checks.rule_description: Missing description for security group rule.
failed_checks.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons
failed_checks.resolution: Add descriptions for all security groups rules
failed_checks.description: Security group rule does not have a description.

failed_checks.rule_description: Missing description for security group rule.
failed_checks.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons
failed_checks.resolution: Add descriptions for all security groups rules
failed_checks.description: Security group rule does not have a description.

failed_checks.rule_description: Missing description for security group rule.
failed_checks.impact: Descriptions provide context for the firewall rule reasons
failed_checks.resolution: Add descriptions for all security groups rules
failed_checks.description: Security group rule does not have a description.

failed_checks.rule_description: aws_instance should activate session tokens for Instance Metadata Service.
failed_checks.impact: Instance metadata service can be interacted with freely
failed_checks.resolution: Enable HTTP token requirement for IMDS
failed_checks.description: Launch template does not require IMDS access to require a token

failed_checks.rule_description: An egress security group rule allows traffic to /0.
failed_checks.impact: Your port is egressing data to the internet
failed_checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
failed_checks.description: Security group rule allows egress to multiple public internet addresses.

failed_checks.rule_description: An ingress security group rule allows traffic from /0.
failed_checks.impact: Your port exposed to the internet
failed_checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
failed_checks.description: Security group rule allows ingress from public internet.

failed_checks.rule_description: An ingress security group rule allows traffic from /0.
failed_checks.impact: Your port exposed to the internet
failed_checks.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
failed_checks.description: Security group rule allows ingress from public internet.

failed_checks.rule_description: Instances in a subnet should not receive a public IP address by default.
failed_checks.impact: The instance is publicly accessible
failed_checks.resolution: Set the instance to not be publicly accessible
failed_checks.description: Subnet associates public IP address.

failed_checks.rule_description: Instances in a subnet should not receive a public IP address by default.
failed_checks.impact: The instance is publicly accessible
failed_checks.resolution: Set the instance to not be publicly accessible
failed_checks.description: Subnet associates public IP address.

failed_checks.rule_description: VPC Flow Logs is a feature that enables you to capture information about the IP traffic going to and from network interfaces in your VPC. After you've created a flow log, you can view and retrieve its data in Amazon CloudWatch Logs. It is recommended that VPC Flow Logs be enabled for packet "Rejects" for VPCs.
failed_checks.impact: Without VPC flow logs, you risk not having enough information about network traffic flow to investigate incidents or identify security issues.
failed_checks.resolution: Enable flow logs for VPC
failed_checks.description: VPC Flow Logs is not enabled for VPC

failed_checks.rule_description: Load balancer is exposed to the internet.
failed_checks.impact: The load balancer is exposed on the internet
failed_checks.resolution: Switch to an internal load balancer or add a tfsec ignore
failed_checks.description: Load balancer is exposed publicly.

failed_checks.rule_description: Load balancers should drop invalid headers
failed_checks.impact: Invalid headers being passed through to the target of the load balance may exploit vulnerabilities
failed_checks.resolution: Set drop_invalid_header_fields to true
failed_checks.description: Application load balancer is not set to drop invalid headers.

failed_checks.rule_description: IAM policy should avoid use of wildcards and instead apply the principle of least privilege
failed_checks.impact: Overly permissive policies may grant access to sensitive resources
failed_checks.resolution: Specify the exact permissions required, and to which resources they should apply instead of using wildcards.
failed_checks.description: IAM policy document uses sensitive action 'rds-db:connect' on wildcarded resource '*'

failed_checks.rule_description: IAM policy should avoid use of wildcards and instead apply the principle of least privilege
failed_checks.impact: Overly permissive policies may grant access to sensitive resources
failed_checks.resolution: Specify the exact permissions required, and to which resources they should apply instead of using wildcards.
failed_checks.description: IAM policy document uses sensitive action 'rds:*' on wildcarded resource '*'

failed_checks.rule_description: IAM policy should avoid use of wildcards and instead apply the principle of least privilege
failed_checks.impact: Overly permissive policies may grant access to sensitive resources
failed_checks.resolution: Specify the exact permissions required, and to which resources they should apply instead of using wildcards.
failed_checks.description: IAM policy document uses wildcarded action 'rds:*'

failed_checks.rule_description: IAM policy should avoid use of wildcards and instead apply the principle of least privilege
failed_checks.impact: Overly permissive policies may grant access to sensitive resources
failed_checks.resolution: Specify the exact permissions required, and to which resources they should apply instead of using wildcards.
failed_checks.description: IAM policy document uses wildcarded action 'rds:*'

failed_checks.rule_description: RDS Deletion Protection Disabled
failed_checks.resolution: Modify the RDS instances to enable deletion protection.
failed_checks.description: Instance does not have Deletion Protection enabled

failed_checks.rule_description: RDS IAM Database Authentication Disabled
failed_checks.resolution: Modify the PostgreSQL and MySQL type RDS instances to enable IAM database authentication.
failed_checks.description: Instance does not have IAM Authentication enabled

failed_checks.rule_description: Enable Performance Insights to detect potential problems
failed_checks.impact: Without adequate monitoring, performance related issues may go unreported and potentially lead to compromise.
failed_checks.resolution: Enable performance insights
failed_checks.description: Instance does not have performance insights enabled.

failed_checks.rule_description: RDS encryption has not been enabled at a DB Instance level.
failed_checks.impact: Data can be read from RDS instances if compromised
failed_checks.resolution: Enable encryption for RDS instances
failed_checks.description: Instance does not have storage encryption enabled.

failed_checks.rule_description: RDS Cluster and RDS instance should have backup retention longer than default 1 day
failed_checks.impact: Potential loss of data and short opportunity for recovery
failed_checks.resolution: Explicitly set the retention period to greater than the default
failed_checks.description: Instance has very low backup retention period.
